headline: First Solar, Inc. (FSLR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on First Solar, Inc. on Bullseye Research’s Substack by Bullseye Investing. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on FSLR. First Solar, Inc.’s share was trading at $241.88 as of February 20th. FSLR’s trailing and forward P/E were 19.84 and 10.18 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. First Solar, Inc., a […]

headline: Solar Stocks Crashed This Week. Why the Problems Could Last.
summary: Tariffs are pinching margins, federal energy policies are a drag, and demand looks weaker than expected.
